original_text: and be ready by the third day, because on that day the Lord will come down on Mount Sinai in the sight of all the people.
korean_text: 준비하게 하여 셋째 날을 기다리게 하라 이는 셋째 날에 나 여호와가 온 백성의 목전에서 시내 산에 강림할 것임이니

sentences.original_text: and be ready by the third day
the Lord will come down on Mount Sinai
in the sight of all the people
